channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
Ok so i followed a tut how to make a server. It was perfect with no-ip (duc). Portforwarding. When i connect... Works, yay !!! But when my friends connect (on other pc) It doesnt works. I have make earler a topic. But i didnt find it.
Sooooo i need good help !!!
ps: i have a d-link router and LAN

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Spyder Owner Spyder
item.description:
@Owner_Spyder wrote:

you should download uTorrnent and it port fowards so your friends can log on too. Go to google and download it and then run it & press the little orangle circle and press connections and change the port to the port it usually is on servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @ak226688 ak226688
item.description:
@ak226688 wrote:

please post ur problem in the name not just “help !!” so then people now what ur problem is, if somebody who knows what to do sees help they might not help but if they see ur problem in the name they will help

Read full topic
